snippet: One issue lawmakers could be confronted with has been bubbling up from New York City: balancing the need for criminal-justice reform with safeguarding the police.
abstract: New York State Assembly and Senate are set to convene in Albany, with Republicans in a clear majority in Senate; one issue lawmakers could be confronted with is reforming the criminal justice system, while safeguarding the police.
lead_paragraph: One issue lawmakers could be confronted with has been bubbling up from New York City: balancing the need for criminal-justice reform with safeguarding the police.

headline.main: New York State Legislature Will Convene Amid a Changed Political Landscape
headline.print_headline: Legislative Session Will Convene in Albany Amid a Changed Political Landscape
